df = get_data()
mean = expected_returns.mean_historical_return(df)
assert isinstance(mean, pd.Series)
assert list(mean.index) == list(df.columns)
assert mean.notnull().all()
assert mean.dtype == 'float64'
correct_mean = np.array([0.26770284, 0.3637864, 0.31709032, 0.22616723, 
    0.49982007, 0.16888704, 0.22754479, 0.14783539, 0.19001915, 0.08150653,
    0.12826351, 0.25797816, 0.07580128, 0.16087243, 0.20510267, 0.3511536, 
    0.38808003, 0.24635612, 0.21798433, 0.28474973])
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(mean.values, correct_mean)
